Any tips to play this on non Windows machines? Even VLC doesn't like this (and it usually play anything).

Thanks! Codec (that makes it playable in MPC, but contains a player also) for this, that works in Win-XP and Win-Vista here:
http://www.moviecodec.com/downloads/305d.html
Never mind my comment about codec :P The one included in the torrent (Motion Pixels Video Codec for XP.zip) is the same, it works for Vista also.

I'm probably being completely thick here, but I need some help.  I have downloaded this but don't know how to install the codecs or view this in anyway. Could someone kindly guide me through step-by-step please (from the point that the download finshed)?  Thanks in advance.
